wifiguest_enrollment.signUpDescription: Free Wi-Fi on board and a world of benefits? Join Shannun Guest and get our Chat package for free, plus 500 bonus miles. Enter your flight details to get started.
wifiguest_enrollment.signUpPopuplinkLabel: Your six-character booking reference is on your booking confirmation.
wifiguest_enrollment.existingShannunGuestNotification: You're already an Shannun Guest member. Log in to our portal on board to access free Wi-Fi.
wifiguest_enrollment.quickEnrolledGuestNotification: Your Shannun Guest account has been created. Use your account details to log in to our Wi-Fi portal on board.
wifiguest_enrollment.signUpFormDescription: Enter your details below to join Shannun Guest and avail a Chat package for free on this flight.
wifiguest_enrollment.termsandconditionText: I agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.

faq.faqItemHeading: Is Wi-Fi free for my flight?
faq.faqItemDescription: If you are an Shannun Guest member, you can enjoy a free Chat package for the duration of your flight. In addition, all First and Shannun Guest Platinum members will receive complimentary Wi-Fi on board. All other guests are required to purchase Wi-Fi.

faq.faqItemHeading: Do I need to purchase Wi-Fi before my flight, or can I pay on board?
faq.faqItemDescription: You can only purchase Wi-Fi packages once on your flight. You can pay for Wi-Fi packages using credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Alipay and Shannun Guest Miles.

faq.faqItemHeading: How can I purchase onboard Wi-Fi?
faq.faqItemDescription: You can purchase a Wi-Fi package once on board the aircraft and once the seatbelt signs have been switched off. Enable Wi-Fi and connect to the “Shannun Wi-Fly” network, where you'll be directed to the homepage of our Wi-Fi portal.

faq.faqItemHeading: Is Wi-Fi available on all Shannun flights?
faq.faqItemDescription: Wi-Fi is available on all aircraft, with the exception of our A320 and A321 aircraft.

faq.faqItemHeading: Which messaging apps work with the Chat package?
faq.faqItemDescription: All popular messaging apps like WhatsApp, WeChat, Facebook Messenger and iMessage are supported on the Chat package. However, please note that you can't send images or videos on this package.

faq.faqItemHeading: Can I connect to Wi-Fi in aeroplane mode?
faq.faqItemDescription: Yes. You can connect to the onboard “Shannun Wi-Fly” network even if your phone is in aeroplane mode.

faq.faqItemHeading: How do I connect to onboard Wi-Fi?
faq.faqItemDescription:
To connect:

  1. Turn on your Wi-Fi-enabled device and enable Wi-Fi.
  2. Connect to the "Shannun Wi-Fly" network and open your web browser. You'll be directed to the homepage of our onboard Wi-Fi portal, where you can purchase Internet packages, redeem a voucher or re-login if you are a returning customer.
  3. If the portal doesn't appear when you launch your browser, enter a public web address (e.g. www.shannun.com) to redirect your web browser and resolve this issue.

faq.faqItemHeading: Can I connect to Wi-Fi during take-off and landing?
faq.faqItemDescription: No, the Wi-Fi service is only available once the aircraft reaches an altitude of 10,000 feet. Similarly, the Wi-Fi service will be switched off before the aircraft comes to land and descends below an altitude of 10,000 feet.

faq.faqItemHeading: Can I stream videos or music with onboard Wi-Fi?
faq.faqItemDescription: The Chat and Surf packages do not support audio and video streaming.

faq.faqItemHeading: Does my Wi-Fi package cover all legs of my trip, even if I have a stop?
faq.faqItemDescription: You will need to purchase Wi-Fi package per flight leg. E.g., If you're flying from Sydney via Abu Dhabi to London, packages need to be purchased for Sydney to Abu Dhabi and Abu Dhabi to London.

faq.faqItemHeading: Can I use the Wi-Fi package on two devices simultaneously?
faq.faqItemDescription: No, you won't be able to use multiple devices with your Wi-Fi package. Instead, you will have to log off one device and then log into another with the same email you initially created an account with.

faq.faqItemHeading: What if I have bought a Chat package but want to upgrade to a Surf package during the flight?
faq.faqItemDescription: Options to upgrade your package during the flight are not yet available. You can, however, use another email address to purchase a Surf package on a different device.

faq.faqItemHeading: Can I request a refund for the onboard Wi-Fi I've purchased if I've changed my mind?
faq.faqItemDescription: You can request a refund only if your Wi-Fi did not work after purchasing a package. To do so, please write to us here with your flight details and method of payment to claim your refund. Please note that partial refunds will not be processed.

errors.label: PNR is not eligible for quick enrollment

successPageDescription.label:
Thank you for signing up for Shannun Guest. Complete your registration when we land to claim 500 bonus miles.

For now, sit back and enjoy your flight with your free Wi-Fi package.

For now you can claim your free Chat package by using your new credentials to log onto our onboard Wi-Fi portal.
